function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of reported information on ev charging capability may lead to unmonitored and unregulated usage, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread through surface contact on ev charging stations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Partial building fault detection process may result in undetected issues with hvac systems, leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to simultaneously heat and cool rooms may lead to inconsistent temperature control, creating discomfort for occupants and potentially impacting their immune response, thereby increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of automatic operable windows or skylights","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited reporting of window and skylight position","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart windows","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of temperature control in individual rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient coverage of relevant heating loads by meters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domestic hot water storage and control","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient local electricity production and storage for ev charging","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simultaneous heating and cooling limitations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart grid integration","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective control of lighting systems leading to inadequate visibility and potential safety hazards.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient cooling system maintenance leading to poor temperature control and potential discomfort for occupants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of people in healthcare building","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and humidity control","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control over hot water supply","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legislative constraints prevent the storage of locally produced electricity, leading to suboptimal consumption.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity consumption.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control over thermal exchanges and absence of fault-detection and diagnostics platform pose risks for maintaining indoor air quality and temperature regulation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of individual room control for cooling may lead to uneven temperature distribution and poor ventilation in certain areas, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on manual control for lighting and dynamic envelope elements may result in suboptimal use of natural light and ventilation, leading to indoor air quality issues and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reported thermal energy storage tes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant heating loads are metered","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No reporting on domestic hot water usage","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing and collaboration between technical managers in healthcare information involves interacting with building staff and users, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evaluation and auditing of current bacs involves physical interaction with building systems and devices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of bacs design and functionalities improvements involves on-site work and potential exposure to contagions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex equations and technical language make it difficult for
